rdf:Description.dc:title: Models for accident investigation 1985
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Harvey, Michael D.
Alberta Workers' Health, Safety and Compensation. Occupational Health and Safety Division.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton] : Alberta Workers' Health, Safety and Compensation, Occupational Health and Safety Division,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Second report in a two part literature review project commissioned by the Alberta Occupational Health and Safety Division. First literature review has title: Theories of accident causation.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Industrial accidents
Accident investigation.
